name: Fonid
tag_list: mobile, smartphones, new-media, twinteract, twitter, facebook, hyves, myspace-
overview:
Fonid developes concepts and solutions for new-media . The solutions are aimed at new era platforms like iPhone and Android (the Zwopp app) and social media (twitter, facebook, hyves).

Milestones: Zwopp app: The first app that communicates between iPhone and Android phones.

Twinteract: Platform that changes Twittering and Social Networking from “passive following” into “active calling”. This platform can be used to call up lottery drawing for specified tickets, flight info for specified flichtnumbers, traffic info for specfic roads, horoscopes for specific dates, etc.

Lotteryalarm: Lottery draw results for specific lottery tickets thru sms, twitter, social media. (www.loterijwekker.nl)
